action.action-desc: Ms. McCollum introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Select Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select)

form.official-title: To prohibit the use of global health activities to collect foreign intelligence, and for other purposes.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Global Health Worker Protection Act of 2014
.

section.header: Prohibition on use of global health activities for intelligence gathering

subsection.text: The Central Intelligence Agency and any other department or agency may not use health or humanitarian workers or activities, including immunization and vaccination campaigns, health education and surveillance, or direct health services, in countries outside of the United States for the purpose of collecting foreign intelligence.
Nothing in this Act shall be construed to restrict the provision of medical services to individuals involved in authorized intelligence activities on behalf of the United States.
